issue.title: [Rust]: Use const fn for applicable methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10338](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10338). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have realized that most of the propagation is not happening correctly and still boundary checks are triggered for kernels and operations. For this reason, if applicable, methods should use const fn.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10338?focusedCommentId=17217663) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8487
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8487>
